body_html:
It would be nice to get this merged. @lazypanda1 I think this now needs to replace Variable with torch.tensor.

Hi @fritzo , there seems to be a lot of changes required for this. Can you please clarify the following? Should I just change all:
Variable(torch.Tensor([0.0, 0.0]), requires_grad=True) to
variable([0.0, 0.0], requires_grad=True)
body_text:
It would be nice to get this merged. @lazypanda1 I think this now needs to replace Variable with torch.tensor.

Hi @fritzo , there seems to be a lot of changes required for this. Can you please clarify the following? Should I just change all:
Variable(torch.Tensor([0.0, 0.0]), requires_grad=True)  to
variable([0.0, 0.0], requires_grad=True)
body:
> It would be nice to get this merged. @lazypanda1 I think this now needs to replace Variable with torch.tensor.

Hi @fritzo , there seems to be a lot of changes required for this. Can you please clarify the following? Should I just change all:
`Variable(torch.Tensor([0.0, 0.0]), requires_grad=True)`  to 
`variable([0.0, 0.0], requires_grad=True)`
